Content.Text:
<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yo, 'morning. Don't look so glum from
the start of day. You're dragging me
down.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yo, 'morning. The sun came up ages ago.
Get to work, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yo, 'morning. Your voice is always so
loud! Nice and refreshing.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yo, <MYNAME>. Now then, maybe I'll go
catch a big fish. Want to see my
technique?

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yo, <MYNAME>. Anything to do with fish,
I'm your guy. You can ask me anything.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yo, <MYNAME>. Thanks for all the help you
give my wife. Appreciate it.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yo, <MYNAME>. Working late at the farm,
eh? That's the spirit!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yo, <MYNAME>. Why are you up so late?
Can't it wait until tomorrow?

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yo, <MYNAME>. It's late. You should go
home!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yo, <MYNAME>. Man, look at this weather! 
Days like this are great for catching
lots of fish.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yo, <MYNAME>. Even when the weather is as
bad as this, once you started fishing,
it doesn't bother you at all.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Yo, <MYNAME>. Gah, it's hot! This heat'll
dry up the river!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Yo, <MYNAME>. It gets so humid when it
rains! Man, it's irritating!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yo, <MYNAME>. This is the best time of
year to eat fish! Now eat up!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yo, <MYNAME>. Rainy days are nice once in
a while. You know what I mean, right?

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Yo, <MYNAME>. When it's this cold, I can
barely grip my fishing pole! Any chance
we could just skip winter this year?

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Yo, <MYNAME>. Can't get into the mood to
fish when it snows. Gah, too cold!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yo, <MYNAME>. You've got guts, going out
in a typhoon. Impressive!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yo, <MYNAME>. You've got guts, going out
in a snowstorm. Impressive!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yo, <MYNAME>. I hear you found someone
special. Congrats!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>If it weren't for you, my wife and I'd
still have to be living apart. So I
wanted to say thanks.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
My wife's cooking tastes great when you
eat it in a place like this!
<PAGE>
<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Here, try some, <MYNAME>? You're young. No
need to hold back.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This river's something else. There are
all sorts of fish here. Business is good
as a result!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm completely smitten with this river.
There aren't many with so much great
fish. I get to eat food every day!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I pray at the spring every time I come
here, asking to catch lots of fish. Nice
thought, huh?

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Once in a while, you see a human-sized
shadow in this spring.
<PAGE>
That must be one huge fish! I'm gonna
catch it one of these days.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Huh? There's no such fish? What're you
saying? You can't tell unless we catch
it!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Your farm is something else. You always
manage to surprise me!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, you're something else. For
someone with a small body, you sure
are strong. That's a compliment, okay?

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't care much for dark places. But
maybe an underground lake with lots of
fish... that'd be different.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. I heard a sound over that
way. Maybe there's something there.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Isn't this town a little desolate? Geez,
I can't do business here.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like lively towns. This town isn't
bad, but I wish it had a little more
life to it.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This town has energy. A town like this
gets me excited.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's a great little town... Anyone would
love living in a place like this.
<PAGE>
You really worked hard, didn't you?

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I hear you're rebuilding the
town. Alright, if there's anything I can
do, you can call on me anytime!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
No one can beat me in fishing. Not even
those who call themselves experts!
<PAGE>
<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I'll accept any fishing challenge. And I
won't lose either.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I enjoy fiddling around with fishing
gear. To me, running a fish shop is the
dream job. Just like you and your farm.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I have brothers. There are five of us,
from the oldest on down, Koichiro,
Kojiro, Kosaburo, Koshiro, and Kogoro.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Huh? All the names sound alike? Don't
criticize the names our parents gave us!
They're all perfectly good names!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, even if your farm isn't
profitable, you can still survive by
fishing. You'll make it through.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I met my wife in this town.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>It was my wife who fell in love with me,
too. I'm not kidding!
<PAGE>
<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>When my wife was young, she was such a
beauty. I wish you could've seen her,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've taken a liking to you, <MYNAME>! Tell
me anything you need. We're pals!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, this is squid rice! You're a great
guy, <MYNAME>! This is great!
<PAGE>
I can't get enough of this sauce! What a
lucky day. Thanks.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>! This is for me? That's nice
of you. This is one of my favorites.
<PAGE>
I've been craving it a little, actually.
Thanks.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>! This is for me? Man, what a
nice guy you are.
<PAGE>
This is one of my favorites. Thanks a
lot.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're giving this to me? Thanks!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hey, <MYNAME>... Oh well, I don't care for
this, but I'll take it.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Don't ever come here again! Bringing me
something I hate... you ninny!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Get outta here! Making me drink grass
juice!
<PAGE>
This is the thing I hate most! Get outta
here or I'll give you a little payback!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Boy, this turnip looks delicious. It's
so big, it's defying me to eat it! I'm
gonna have my wife cook it up good!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm going to relish every bite of this.
It's so big, it's defying me to eat it!
Thanks.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Man, what a big turnip. Getting to eat
something this big is like a dream!
Thanks, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
If my wife sees something this big,
she's gonna faint.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I flatly refuse. Put it away.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Look, I don't want it. If I accept, I'm
not a man.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is great! Squid rice for my
birthday! Oh yeah, that's the stuff!
<PAGE>
I can't get enough of this sauce! What a
lucky year. Thanks.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>! Thanks for giving me this.
Today is my birthday.
<PAGE>
You knew? Well, how about that? You're
something else.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>! This is for me? Man, you're
amazing.
<PAGE>
Birthdays are nice, eh. Thanks!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hey, <MYNAME>... You didn't do this to
spite me, didja?
<PAGE>
Aw well, it's my birthday, so I'll
accept.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Don't ever come around again! Bringing
me something like this!
<PAGE>
It's my birthday today, too... argh!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Get outta here! Making me drink grass
juice! Quit joking around!
<PAGE>
It's my birthday today, too... get outta
here or I'll give you a little payback!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Boy, this turnip looks delicious. It's
so big, it's defying me to eat it! I'm
gonna have my wife cook it up good!
<PAGE>
What a birthday treat this will be.
Thanks, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is perfect for my birthday. It's
so big, it's defying me to eat it!
Thanks.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Boy, this is a huge turnip. Getting to
eat a turnip like this is like a dream.
Birthdays are nice, eh.
<PAGE>
Thanks, <MYNAME>! I'll enjoy every bite
of it.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
If my wife sees something this big,
she's gonna faint.
<PAGE>
I never expected anything like this for
my birthday. Thanks.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Aww, cheep, cheep, cheep...it's so
noisy. Can you hurry up and take them
away?

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
The rooster's so noisy. Can you hurry up
and take it away?

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
*Laugh* What made them get so huge?
<PAGE>
Man, my belly hurts! This is just
perfect!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
That yapping is so noisy. Can you hurry
up and take the beast away?

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What? This is a puppy?
<PAGE>
*Laugh*, a pup that can't run! Someone
needs to start dieting.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
That yapping is so noisy. Can you hurry
up and take the beast away?

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What? This is a puppy?
<PAGE>
*Laugh*, I thought you went and got a
new pet.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
This meowing is so noisy. Can you hurry
up and take the creature away?

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What? This is a kitty?
<PAGE>
*Laugh*, a cat that can't run. Someone
needs to start dieting!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
This meowing is so noisy. Can you hurry
up and take the creature away?

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What? This is a kitty?
<PAGE>
*Laugh*, I thought you went and got a
new pet.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Flowers and me... we don't go together.
But since you're so kind, I'll accept.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is famous. A present for me for
the Pumpkin Festival? My wife'll get a
laugh out of that.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've only got eyes for my wife. I've
never shown a blue feather to anyone but
her.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've only got eyes for my wife. I've
never shown a ring to anyone but her.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Ack, don't give it to me. Take it far,
far away! Come on!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not interested. All I care about
are fish.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why're you holding something like that?
You'd better get rid of it quickly.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Take this. And don't tell
anyone else.
<PAGE>
It's your birthday, right? That's just 
a small thing from me.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My wife told me. It's your birthday,
right, <MYNAME>? Congratulations!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, it's been a long time. At least
keep in touch, you jerk!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I have everything you need for fishing.
If you can't catch anything, the problem
is with your own skill.

Ohh... mmm... I have high hopes... for
you... Uuh... Ngh... It got away...

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Magic is amazing! I can't take my eyes
of it!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What're you saying?! I'm eating. If you
wanna talk, come back later!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a wooden bench. Did you make it?
<PAGE>
I see. You do fine work.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A green bench is nice. It matches its
surroundings perfectly. Great work.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A blue bench is nice. I love the color
blue. Great work.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's that big wooden box for anyway?
<PAGE>
What? It's just left there?! What a
waste. Use it for firewood.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, a scarecrow! What's it doing here?!
<PAGE>
A scarecrow's supposed to be out in the
crops!
<PAGE>
Don't be foolin' around here!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a mighty fine pot. You made it?
<PAGE>
Hmm... you're pretty skilled. You really
brought out the colors.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's a nice desk you have there. It
looks sturdy and easy to use.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you have a tea table. Are you gonna
have a tea party, princess?
<PAGE>
I don't have much to do with anything
fancy like that.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A log chair... That's nice. I'd like to
use it for fishing, but it looks heavy,
so I'd better not.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a huge parasol. It's used when
drinking tea, right? I know that much.
<PAGE>
I just had a thought, is all. What if
you opened the parasol and jumped off
a mountain?
<PAGE>
I'm light, so I think I'd float down
slowly. Maybe I'll try it sometime.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A beacon is classy. Is there a festival
or something?
<PAGE>
Not really, eh. Well, it brightens up
the night.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A paper lantern... How cool is that?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I'd like to borrow it for night fishing,
it's okay if I can't.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you bring that stone lantern from
somewhere?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>What? You made it? That's some talent.
Almost a waste to stay on the farm.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a grand wooden pillar. I thought
you were going to build a house around
it, there's something weird on the top.
<PAGE>
Say, just what is that? Huh? Oh, is that
so? I see.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a strange statue. Is it what
they call a totem pole? It's got a
bunch of cryptic carvings on it.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A statue of a woman with a spear... 
What does that mean, then?
<PAGE>
I don't understand complicated stuff,
but the woman's pretty.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How come there's a bridge?
<PAGE>
I've heard of a river without a bridge,
but a bridge without a river? Seems
strange to me.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I thought watchtowers are supposed to be
taller, but I guess not.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Darumas are nice, but this one of too
big to go inside the house.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A pine decoration...that's unusual. You
don't see them these days. I guess times
have changed.
<PAGE>
It's nice to see old traditions being
kept alive.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A bamboo fountain has class. You know
your stuff, don't you?
<PAGE>
Hearing that clear bamboo sound
somewhere in a vast garden... that's
refinement for you.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a surprise. Where'd you get this
huge anchor?
<PAGE>
I haven't seen any big boats in the
waters nearby... Huh? For decoration?
<PAGE>
I guess so... kinda surprising to just
come across it like this, though!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A mechanical lion... It's been a while
since I saw once. It's so still. Doesn't
it move?
<PAGE>
It moves if you put a coin in? What,
some sort of electrical contraption?
<PAGE>
Shucks...I thought I'd put it on my head
and shake people up.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This part of town sorta feels nice. I
get this nostalgic feeling.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This part of town has a nice atmosphere.
It sorta feels nostalgic.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a magnificent garden. It's nice,
but I don't think it suits me.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This part of town has interesting stuff.
I don't know what I'm going to see next!
It's kinda fun.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a pretty magnificent garden. It's
not really my taste, but it's grand.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bonsai have deep meaning. I mean, you're
taking a tree that usually grows big and
nurturing it, keeping it small.
<PAGE>
...And over time, you shape the branches
in the way you want them to be.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Cherry trees are nice. There's nothing
like it. Can't go flower-viewing without
cherry blossoms.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The colors of the gingko trees are nice.
The falling leaves are nice too, but
they sorta make me sad.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Circular plants pruned by professionals 
look nice. Really soothing on the eyes.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The branches make or break a pine tree.
But this one's nice. You've got some
skills.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Cherry trees are nice. There's nothing
like it. Can't go flower-viewing without
cherry blossoms.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The colors of the gingko trees are nice.
The falling leaves are nice too, but
they sorta make me sad.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bamboo fences are simple and nice. Also
kinda nostalgic.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A wooden wall is stylish. It'd be
perfect if you could see some pine trees
peeking over the top.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Rice fields are nice. Hard work, but
keep at it and they pay off with a big
harvest.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I brought this for you! Just a token
of my thanks for your own kind present.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I brought this for you! Just a token
of my thanks for your own kind present.

Now is not the time to be giving
presents.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear this town has a hair salon. The
wife said so. Well, it's got nothin'
to do with me.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I never go to the tailor, so I don't
even know what they sell.
<PAGE>
Clothes? I see. Well, that's got nothin'
to do with me.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Does having a restaurant mean that I can
have my favorite, squid rice?
<PAGE>
That's great. They really have it on the
menu? Squid rice?

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
About this travel agency. Do they take
you anywhere you wanna go?
<PAGE>
I'd like to go to a southern island and 
fish for marlin. Is there a tour like
that?

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sitting in a tea shop sipping hot tea
is nice. And if there's soy milk cake,
there's nothing better.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Moving house is such a pain. Now I'd go 
anywhere as long as I had my fishing
pole.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's fine if the town grows, but it'll
be noisy with too many people.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town has a really western look,
but doesn't it look a little gaudy?
Can't it be more subdued?

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
An eastern style look is better. You can
feel it when you're strolling around.
Very calming.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town as lots of tropical motifs. I
don't understand a lot of the things,
but I guess it's a matter of taste.
